title: How do I turn off message previews on Pixel 2?
content:
I'm a Paralegal, and I need to not have message previews show up on my phone when I'm in Court for privacy reasons. We use an app called Telegram for security, but I can't find out how to turn off the message content previews on my Pixel 2.

To reiterate: I still want the notification, just not the content of the message. Like "Discord message" or "Telegram message" - How do I do this?

I'm using the latest Android version that's pushed over the air.

Thanks for your help, everyone!
